English or Russian

HOW TO CHANGE RUSSIAN IN GAME MENU LANGUAGE TO ENGLISH                                                           1.install a game                                                                2.create anywhere a New Text Document,rename settings.txt                                                       3.write in settings.txt - Locale=Eng                                                      4.Save and Copy this .txt file in (XP - hidden files)C:\Documents and Settings\USERS\Local  Settings\Application Data\EA Games\DeadSpace 2                                                                     5.Done! Changed in English
